SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!Common logging
!API ID :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "API ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_API_ID# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Veracode CLI Location :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Veracode CLI Location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_CLI_PATH# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Proxy Host :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Proxy Host" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_HOST# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Proxy Port :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Proxy Port" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_PORT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Proxy User :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Proxy User" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_USER# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
